publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2660 Rosie Kane: STUC Support for M74—That the Parliament notes with regret the STUC’s support for the M74 project and calls on the STUC to reconsider its position on the project and withdraw that support in light of the fact that there is no evidence that this project will create jobs and, indeed, that job creation will only come from investment in a properly integrated public transport system.
S2M-2660 STUC Support for M74 (lodged on 24 March 2005) Tommy Sheridan*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2660 STUC Support for M74 (lodged on 24 March 2005) Eleanor Scott*
